data.name: TERA - Wolfrider Pack
data.detailed_description:
Lose yourself in the action-packed world of TERA and pick up a package containing the inventory companion 'Caddy'!


In this breathtaking MMORPG you need to take fate in your own hands, carefully aiming your attacks and dodging enemy spells in the dynamic True Action Combat system. Seven races, twelve classes and countless dungeons, battlegrounds and powerful bosses – TERA pushes the boundaries of the MMO genre!

You must install TERA and create a character before you can use this package.

The package contains:

1x Care and Use of Your Pet 'Caddy'

Caddy is a cuddly companion who will provide you with an additional inventory with 72 slots.

1x Riding Skill: Lupus Obscurus

Lupus Obscurus is a steel wolf which can be summoned at any time. Your health will regenerate while mounted on the back of this riding wolf.

1x Veteran Complete Crystalbind

This crystalbind protects the crystals in your gear from destruction for twelve hours.

2x Goddess’ Blessing

Use the Goddess’ Blessing to resurrect at the location of your death, should you die.

4x Strong Bravery Potion

Strong Bravery Potions increase your attack speed and skill damage for 30 minutes. They also reduce the damage your receive.

4x Strong Canephora Potion

Strong Canephora Potions increase your skill damage for 30 minutes.

1500x Fashion Coupon

Fashion Coupons can be exchanged for weapon and armor skins in the game.

20x Valiant Potion

Valiant Potions restore your health.

5x Veteran Resurrection Scroll

Resurrect a fallen teammate with this scroll.

data.short_description: This awesome package contains a huge variety of useful items such as a pet which provides an additional inventory, a mount with regenerative effects, a Complete Crystalbind, and much more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130 / AMD FX 4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT / Radeon HD 3870
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570 / AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 4890 1 GB
  • DirectX®: 9
  • Hard Drive: 55 GB HD space
  • Network: Broadband internet connection
